Articles.Content: Currentspace weather conditions, as given by NOAA POES site. Red indicates a 100% chance of seeing auroras. It is forecast to increase in intensity over the next few hours.
500 miles from the view line, and overcast.

If an aurora forms big enough to be seen from the central coast of California, it will probably fry all the electronics in the world and send us back to the 19th century.

.....or cause triffids, because that's how you get triffids.

So PakledHostage, post pictures before we all go blind.
